unnormalised: **Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist: Chai Pe Charcha on Engagement Rates!**
normalised: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist: Chai Pe Charcha on Engagement Rates!

unnormalised: Mumbai, July 26th – Are your social media followers actually vibing with your content, or just lurking like a Sharmaji's uncle at a wedding? New, more in-depth follower analytics are rolling out, giving influencers and brands a granular view.
normalised: Mumbai, July twenty sixth – Are your social media followers actually vibing with your content, or just lurking like a Sharmaji's uncle at a wedding? New, more in-depth follower analytics are rolling out, giving influencers and brands a granular view.

unnormalised: Think beyond basic likes, peeps! This update digs deep into demographics - are more folks from Chennai or Kanpur engaging? What time do they usually scroll? Are they more into reels featuring Bollywood dance routines or travelogues showcasing the beauty of Kerala?
normalised: Think beyond basic likes, peeps! This update digs deep into demographics - are more folks from Chennai or Kanpur engaging? What time do they usually scroll? Are they more into reels featuring Bollywood dance routines or travelogues showcasing the beauty of Kerala?

unnormalised: Dr. Iyer from IIT Madras, a leading data scientist, says this will help creators tailor content for better ROI. Imagine knowing that your target audience in Delhi prefers content on Tuesdays at 7 PM!
normalised: Doctor Iyer from I I T Madras, a leading data scientist, says this will help creators tailor content for better R O I. Imagine knowing that your target audience in Delhi prefers content on Tuesdays at seven P M!

unnormalised: This enhanced analytics includes metrics like 'Chai Time Engagement' – when users are most active during their evening chai break. It helps in predicting sales (in Rs.) based on influencer marketing spends, even accounting for the 'kitna deti hai?' factor – how much engagement per post, basically. Brands with pan-Indian reach (think Lays, or maybe Patanjali) can now finely tune their campaigns for specific regions – maybe more spice for Andhra Pradesh, less for Gujarat?
normalised: This enhanced analytics includes metrics like 'Chai Time Engagement' – when users are most active during their evening chai break. It helps in predicting sales (in rupees) based on influencer marketing spends, even accounting for the 'kitna deti hai?' factor – how much engagement per post, basically. Brands with pan-Indian reach (think Lays, or maybe Patanjali) can now finely tune their campaigns for specific regions – maybe more spice for Andhra Pradesh, less for Gujarat?

unnormalised: The new tools can even analyze optimal post length, down to the number of characters and visual aspect ratio (in sq ft of visuals required for banner ads) to maximize engagement. Ab, India karega rule!
normalised: The new tools can even analyze optimal post length, down to the number of characters and visual aspect ratio (in square feet of visuals required for banner ads) to maximize engagement. Ab, India karega rule!
